name: CRM app with customers, deals, nested data, tasks and menu filtering
description:
Buzzy lets you build working apps straight from Figma.


- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Watch this video on how to use and publish this file

Jump to 3:50 for critical information on setting up your select fields!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -


This is an example desktop- or tablet-based CRM app - watch a brief walk-through of the working app here. Create and manage customers, deals, activities and tasks. The dashboard includes examples of filtered and sorted results, including the next upcoming appointment, and a task list that highlights overdue and incomplete tasks. This Figma file has all been marked up with the Buzzy Figma plugin.


Grab this file, install the plugin and hit publish - hey presto, you have a working app in a browser. Use this file as a reference for creating and publishing your own data-driven apps using Buzzy, directly from Figma.


New to Buzzy? Try the 'Getting Started' guides
